name: The Tides of Time
storyline: The Tides of Time is an Action-Adventure-RPG with a time-loop mechanic. Sail the oceans and explore the islands of a mysterious world. You are Charlie, a young farmer, who is the only one able to solve the strange things happening at the Day of the Red Sun. Help the villagers, fight bosses and maybe you can save the world from an unknown threat.
